244:4: bodhisattvaḥ kila mahāsattvaḥ kasmiṃścinmahati brāhmaṇakule guṇābhyāsamāhātmyādativṛddhayaśasi pratiniyatasamṛddhiguṇe rājasatkṛte daivatasaṃmate lokasya janma pratileme|
244:5: kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtasaṃskārakarmā śrutaguṇābhyāsādacireṇaiva vidvatsadassu prakāśanāmā babhūva|
244:8: atha sa mahātmā pravrajyākṛtaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvātprajñāvadātamatitvacca na gehe ratimupalebhe|
244:9: sa kāmān vigrahavivādamadavairasyaprācuryādrājacaurodakadahanavipriyadāyādasādhāraṇatvādatṛptijanakatvādanekadoṣāyatanatvācca saviṣamivānnamātmakāmaḥ parityajya saṃhṛtakeśaśmaśruśobhaḥ kāṣāyavivarṇavāsāḥ parityaktagṛhaveṣavibhramaḥ pravrajyāvinayaniyamaśriyamaśiśriyam|
244:11: atha bodhisattvastapovanānugamanavyavasāyamasya vidtvā tapovanādhyāsanāyogyatāṃ ca strīsaukumāryasyāvocadenāṃ-bhadre darśitastvayāyamasmadanurāgasvabhāvaḥ|
244:13: yatraiva tvanyāḥ pravrajitāḥ prativasanti tatra bhavatyāstābhireva sārdha pratirūpaṃ vastuṃ syāt|
244:16: niketahīnā yatayo vasanti yatraiva cāstaṃ ravirabhyupaiti||2||
244:18: nivartituṃ tena matiṃ kuruṣva ko'rthastabānena paribhrameṇa||3||
244:21: kimityevaṃ prapadyeya duḥkha tava ca vipriyam||4||
244:22: yattu naiva samarthāsmi vartituṃ rahitā tvayā|
244:24: iti sā dvitrirapyucyamānāyadā necchati sma nivartitum,
244:26: sa tayānugamyamānaścakravāka iva cakravākyā grāmanagaranigamānanuvicaran kadācitkṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ kasmiṃścitpravivikte śrimati nānātarugahanopaśobhite ghanapracchāye kṛtopakāra iva kvacitkvaciddinakarakiraṇacandrakairnānukusumarajo'vakīrṇadharaṇitale śucau vanoddeśe dhyānavidhimanuṣṭhāya sāyānhasamaye vyutthāya samādheḥ pāṃsukūlāni sivyati sma|
244:27: sāpi pravrajitā tasyaiva nātīdūre vṛkṣamūlamupaśobhayamānā devateva svena vapuṣaḥ prabhāveṇa virājamānā tadupadiṣṭena manaskāravidhinā dhyāyati sma|
244:28: atha tatratyo rājā vasantakālajanitābhyadhikakisalayaśobhāni bhramadbhramaramadhukarīgaṇopakūjitāni pramattakokilakulakilakilāni prahasitakamalakuvalayālaṃkṛtābhilaṣaṇiyajalāśayāni vividhakusumasaṃmodagandhādhivāsitasukhapavanānyupavanāni samanuvicaraṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma|
244:33: atha sa rājā savinayamabhigamya bodhisattvaṃ kṛtapratisaṃmodanakathastatraikānte nvaṣidata|
244:34: sa tāṃ pravrajitāmatimanoharadarśanāmabhivīkṣya tasyā rūpaśobhayā samākṣipyamāgahṛdayo nūnamasyeyaṃ sahadharmacāriṇītyavetya lolasvabhavatvāttadapaharaṇopāyaṃ vimamarśa|
244:37: tasya buddhirabhavat-tapaḥprabhāvamasya jñātvā śakyamatra tadyuktaṃ pravartituṃ nānyathā|
244:39: atha vītarāgaḥ syānmandāpekṣo vā tato'smin saṃbhāvyaṃ tapaḥprabhavamāhātmyam|
244:40: iti vicintya sa rājā tapahprabhāvajijñāsayā bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣivaduvāca-bhoḥ pravrajita pracuradhūrtasāhasikapuruṣe'smiṃlloke na yuktamatrabhavato nirākrandeṣu vaneṣvevaṃ pratirūpayānayā sahadharmacāriṇyā saha vicaritum|
244:41: asyāṃ hi te kaścidaparādhyamāno niyatasmānapyupakrośabhājanīkuryāt| paśya
244:42: evaṃ vivikteṣu tapaḥkṛśaṃ tvāṃ dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ paribhūya kaścit|
244:43: imāṃ prasahyāpaharedyadā te śokātparaṃ kiṃ bata tatra kuryāḥ||9||
244:45: vasatviyaṃ tena janānta eva strīsaṃnikarṣeṇa ca kiṃ yatīnām||10||
244:48: syādatra me yaḥ pratikūlavartī darpodbhavādapratisaṃkhyayā vā|
244:49: vyaktaṃ na mucyeta sa jīvato me dhārādhanasyeva dhanasya reṇuḥ||11||
244:50: atha sa rājā tīvrāpekṣo'yamasyāṃ tapaḥprabhāvahīna ityavajñāya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tadapāyanirāśaṅkaḥ kāmarāgavaśagaḥ strīsaṃdarśanādhikṛtān puruṣān samādideśa-gacchataitāṃ pravrajitāmantaḥpuraṃ praveśayateti|
244:51: tadupaśrutya sā pravrajitā vyālamṛgābhidruteva vanamṛgī bhayaviṣādaviklavamukhī bāṣpoparudhyamānanayanā gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhī tattadārtivaśādvilalāpa-
244:53: sa eva yasya tvanayābahuḥ syādākrandanaṃ kasya nu tena kāryam||12||
244:54: bhraṣṭādhikārā bata lokapālā na santi vā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatā vā|
244:55: na trātumārtāniti ye sayatnā dharmo'pi manye śrutimātrameva||13||
244:56: kiṃ vā surairme bhagavān yadevaṃ madbhāgadheyairdhṛtamauna eva|
244:59: itthaṃgatāyāmapi tasya maunaṃ tathāpi jīvāmi ca mandabhāgyā||15||
244:61: ārteṣu kārūṇyamayī pravṛttistapodhanānāṃ kimayaṃ na mārgaḥ||16||
244:62: śaṅke tavādyāpi tadeva citte nivartyamānāsmi na yannivṛttā|
244:63: tavāpriyeṇāpi mayepsitaṃ yadātmapriyaṃhā tadidaṃ kathaṃ me||17||
244:64: iti tāṃ pravrajitā karunavilāpākranditaruditamātraparāyaṇāṃ te rājasamādiṣṭāḥ puruṣā yānamāropya paśyata eva tasya mahasattvasyāntaḥpurāya ninyuḥ|
244:65: bodhisattvo'pi pratisaṃkhyānabalātpratinudya krodhabalaṃ tathaiba pāṃsukūlāni niḥsaṃkṣobhaḥ praśāntacetāḥ sīvyati sma|
244:69: taddarśaya svāṃ bhujayo ruṣaṃ vā tejastapaḥsaṃśrayasaṃbhṛtaṃ vā|
244:72: yo'bhūnmamātra pratikūlavartī vispandamāno'pi sa me na muktaḥ|
244:73: prasahya nītaḥ praśamaṃ mayā tu tasmādyathārthaiva mama pratijñā||20||
244:74: atha sa rājā tena bodhisattvasya dhairyātiśayavyañjakena praśamena samutpāditatapasviguṇasaṃbhāvanaścintāmāpede-anyadevānena brāhmaṇenābhisaṃdhāya bhāṣitam,
244:76: ko'nyastavābhūtpratikūlavartī yo visphuranneva na te vimuktaḥ|
244:77: reṇuḥ samudyanniva toyadena kaścopanītaḥ praśamaṃ tvayātra||21||
244:79: jāte na dṛśyate yasminnajāte sādhu dṛśyate|
244:80: abhūnme sa na muktaśca krodhaḥ svāśrayabādhanaḥ||22||
244:85: yenābhibhūtaḥ kuśalaṃ jahāti prāptādapi bhraśyata eva cārthāt|
244:89: dahanamiva vijṛmbhamāṇaraudraṃ śamayati yo hṛdayajvaraṃ na roṣam|
244:90: laghurayamiti hīyate'sya kīrtiḥ kumudasakhīva śaśiprabhā prabhāte||27||
244:92: vikasati niyamena tasya kīrtiḥ śaśina ivābhinavasya maṇḍalaśrīḥ||28||
244:95: saroṣaśalye hṛdaye ca duḥkhaṃ mahārhaśayyāṅkagato'pi śete||29||
244:104: ato na muktaḥ kopo me visphurannapi cetasi|
244:106: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhutena praśamaguṇena hṛdayagrāhakeṇa ca vacasābhiprasāditamatiruvāca--
244:117: evaṃ cobhayorarthaṃ caratyakrodhana ityevamādiṣu kṣamānuśaṃsāpratisaṃyukteṣu sūtreṣu vācyam|
